name: Scandic Varnamo

reviews.text: My family and I stayed one night at this hotel earlier this month. When we arrived to our room in the late afternoon we found that it was incredibly hot. This was due to it facing west and had thus been subjected to a long afternoon sun. There was a fan provided and with an open window for several hours and having placed the fan to blow air in to the room things were bearable after the sun had set. However, we still all walked around in our underwear only. Unfortunately we could not keep the window open during the night as there are several noisy machines on the same side, thus it was an option of disturbance by noise or warmth.
reviews.title: In desperate need of air conditioning

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I commented the problem to the receptionist and suggested they close the blinds when cleaning the rooms, that way the sun wont heat the room as much. Before we checked out we closed the blinds to save the next guest from the same temperature but when we passed the hotel a couple of hours later, we saw that housekeeping had opened the blinds again.
reviews.title: Stopover hotel - nothing special

reviews.text: Apart from noise and heat, the hotel was alright. Staff were nice, location good and free parking.
reviews.title: Nothing wrong - nothing right

reviews.text: I agree with the other reviews about this hotel - there's nothing wrong with this hotel but it's nothing special.
reviews.title: Average hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms are fine if you just need a place to stay while travelling, which is what we did. Some serious refurbishment is needed for the whole hotel though. It looks quite tired and worn.
reviews.title: Okay, but not up to normal Scandic standards

reviews.text: This hotel is a very interesting hotel for anyone who is in to architecture. Built around 1950 and the owners has renovated it to look as it did, with all the beutiful furnitures from well-know archictecturs. It is a real pleasure to walk around the hotel and see all the work that the owners have done. Therefor we were suprised to notice that the restaurant didn't make us feel happy - at all. Overcooked vegetables, to much salt, meat that tasted like a bit of paper. Same with the breakfast. They served scrambled eggs made of eggpowder instead of real eggs....
reviews.title: Lovely interior but the food was bad

description: The Design hotel Scandic Värnamo is centrally located within walking distance to nature, shopping and activities.There are good opportunities for recreation, fishing and training - walking in Store Mosse national park or take a round of golf at Värnamo Golf Club. Do not forget to visit Möbelriket, which also inspired the hotel's design.Scandic Värnamo ideal for both holidaymakers and business travelers. Enjoy a delicious meal in the hotel restaurant and relax with a drink at the bar. Work out in the gym or rejuvenate in the sauna. Conduct business in our 9 flexible meeting rooms with wireless internet access.
